imdb.plot outline: "The Guests" is the first interactive fiction miniseries produced in Catalonia. XAL and Atzucac Films have produced this deadlock project which is entirely enjoyable at: elsconvidatslaserie.com Nacho Loriente is Cristian Regat and Alba Yañez in the role of Marina comforms an incredible, terrific and scary couple! The series was shot entirely with snorry cam.
